component-metadata.description:
This component analyzes the residuals of an ARIMA (AutoRegressive Integrated Moving Average) model by 1. visualizing auto correlation of the residuals 2. performing Ljung-Box test of autocorrelation at lags 1-10 3. visualizing residuals in a line plot 4. calculating the four first central moments of the residuals 5. performing Jarque-Bera test of normality
If you encoutner errors please verify that Preferances > KNIME > Python (labs) > Python environment configuration is set to bundled
